Hauck

Our Story

Hauck has been doing business globally since 1923. In August, 2022 Hauck acquired the US Division of Legler Toys to became a major distributor of toys and gifts in North America.


Our Promise

We've been looking after families since 1923, with equipment and toys for babies, giving your child the best possible start in life. Made to care, designed for love.
